page.title: 03HOUSING IN CALOW
page.content: HOUSING IN CALOW In Calow there are flats, bungalows, semidetached,detached and rows of terraced houses.As you drive along the main road-Top Road,most of the houses are older and are privately owned. Around school there are Council houses and bungalows for families and old people.About 25% of the people are pensioners and some live in a special centre called Goodman Court and they have a bell to ring a warden if they need help.Near the churchyard new flats, houses and bungalows are just being finished,because there are people wanting to move here,some are perhaps going to work at the new hospital.Some of our class do not like the idea of building them so near the graveyard.
